overview: Over the last decades, the world has comfortably settled itself in the front row of a propaganda spectacle orchestrated by the lobby groups of the Big Pharma industry. But most recently, the subject of vaccines and vaccination policies has started to raise strong and determined voices who advocate for clean science, respect for the integrity of the human body and, most importantly, freedom of choice.
tagline: Where there is risk, there must be choice
title: Mandate for Choice
